meta.hint:
Homophones are words that sound the same but have different spellings and meanings.
Example - My friends and I buy lunch at school. Buy means to pay for something.
Example - Then we all eat together by the big tree. By means near.
Example - We say bye to each other when the bell rings. Bye is short for goodbye.
meta.question: Select the correct homophoneExample - of the word given.

content.description:
Identify and select the homophone of eight.
Hannah ate an apple for lunch.

Identify and select the homophone of through.
Elizabeth threw the ball to Barry.

Identify and select the homophone of rights.
He writes good poems.

Identify and select the homophone of knew.
She is moving to a new house.

Identify and select the homophone of flower.
Is there flour in this fruit cake?
